page.title: 19FIRE SERVICES
page.content: INTERVIEW WITH FIRE CHIEF. 22nd MAY 1985 How long have the Fire Brigade been established in Carlton? A.Since 1947 in it's present form. Q. How many fire engines have you got? A.We have two fire engines,one for part time use. Q. How quickly can you be on the road in the event of an alarm call? A. 30 seconds. Q. How many malicious calls do you receive in a day? A. 8 to 10 per cent on average. Q.What do you do when you are not fighting fires? A. Drill,routine inspections,keep fit. Q.How tall are the ladders? A. 9 metres,10 metres,13.5 metres,short extension ladders. Q. How often do you practise? A. Twice a 24 hour day. Q. On average how many times a week do you get called out? A. 16 times a week on average.
